exploreHeader.title: Explore Our Plants
exploreHeader.description: Discover the strength of our operations across multiple specialized plants. Each unit is built with excellence and efficiency to serve our clients better.

units.title: Manufacturing Units
units.description: Our core manufacturing units produce high-quality woven garments with cutting-edge technology and experienced teams.

plants.name: Tusuka Fashions Ltd.
plants.shortDescription: Located in Tongi, 7 km from the airport. Produces 6,500 pcs/day with 800 employees.

details.address: Plot no: 10, Block–B, Tongi Industrial Area, Gazipur, Bangladesh.

plants.name: Tusuka Jeans Ltd.
plants.shortDescription: Located at Tusuka Complex, Gazipur. 9-storied unit with full production capacity.

plants.name: Tusuka Trousers Ltd.
plants.shortDescription: Major unit in Gazipur with high production volume and modern setup.

plants.name: Tusuka Denim Ltd.
plants.shortDescription: Specialized in denim manufacturing at Konabari, Gazipur.

plants.name: Tusuka Apparels Ltd.
plants.shortDescription: Located in Tongi with advanced garment machinery and skilled workforce.

details.address: Hazrat Shahjalal Road, Rajnagar Shataish, Tongi, Gazipur, Bangladesh.

plants.name: Tusuka Stitches Ltd.
plants.shortDescription: Newest unit focusing on outerwear, activewear, and swimwear.

details.address: Hazrat Shahjalal Road, Rajnagar Shataish, Tongi, Gazipur, Bangladesh.

units.title: Laundry Units
units.description: Equipped with state-of-the-art tools for enzyme, stone washing and dyeing.

plants.name: Tusuka Processing Ltd.
plants.shortDescription: High-quality stone, enzyme & dyeing services at Konabari.

plants.name: Tusuka Washing Ltd.
plants.shortDescription: Modern equipment with 440 sets of washing capacity.

units.title: Packaging Unit
units.description: Efficient packaging solution for all production units.

plants.name: Tusuka Packaging Ltd.
plants.shortDescription: Located at the ground floor of Tusuka Complex, Gazipur.

units.title: Embroidery Unit
units.description: Our embroidery unit ensures premium design stitching quality.

plants.name: Needle Art Embroidery Ltd.
plants.shortDescription: Located in Tusuka Complex, Gazipur with 90 skilled employees.
